comments:
This happens when either using the mouse or keyboard shortcuts to switch between editors.  I am using the HTMLBuddy plugin, and this appears to only happen when I navigate to an XML file.  This did not happen with 3.3 M6.

Below is from the error log view:

There was a bug in our code that checked for 'null', however, it would be interesting to know why this happens with the HTMLBuddy plug-in. Maybe they are using internal code. I would file the bug there too with a link to this one.

Fixed in HEAD.
Available in builds > I20070514-0010.
